ygData.subject: RE: foraging
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard that you can use fishing to catch water roots.  I have not spent any time fishing in Kunark so I can t confirm it. Rylos Darkmadrigal Bard of the
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard that you can use fishing to catch water roots. I have not
spent any time fishing in Kunark so I can't confirm it.

Rylos Darkmadrigal
Bard of the 23rd (almost 24th) page





Message: 8
Date: Thu, 18 May 2000 16:23:23 -0700
From: "Steve Quarterman" <steveq@...>
Subject: Re: foraging

I have foraged up many Water Reeds but have never seen the Water Roots.
Where did you find the Plains Pebbles? Has anyone figured out what the
foraging skill is set to for the Iksar? I seem to find lots of stuff but
never get any increase.

Zziggy 10th lvl Iksar Necromancer
Katawyn 24th lvl Wood Elf Bard
